fr.sii.ogham.core.builder

Interface Builder<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the object to construct
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CharsetDetectorBuilder<P>, ConverterBuilder<P>, EnvironmentBuilder<P>, MimetypeDetectionBuilder<P>, PropertiesBuilder<P>, ReplaceMimetypeBuilder<P>, TikaBuilder<P>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSingleResolutionBuilder, AttachImageBuilder, AttachmentHandlingBuilder, AutofillEmailBuilder, AutofillSmsBuilder, AutofillSubjectBuilder, Base64InliningBuilder, CidBuilder, ClassPathResolutionBuilder, ConverterBuilderDelegate, CssHandlingBuilder, CssInliningBuilder, EmailBuilder, EnvironmentBuilderDelegate, FileResolutionBuilder, FixedDelayBuilder, ImageHandlingBuilder, ImageInliningBuilder, MessagingBuilder, MimetypeDetectionBuilderDelegate, PhoneNumbersBuilder, PropertiesBuilderDelegate, RecipientNumberBuilder, RecipientNumberFormatBuilder, ReplaceMimetypeBuilderDelegate, RetryBuilder, SenderNumberBuilder, SenderNumberFormatBuilder, SimpleCharsetDetectorBuilder, SimpleConverterBuilder, SimpleEnvironmentBuilder, SimpleMimetypeDetectionBuilder, SimplePropertiesBuilder, SimpleReplaceMimetypeBuilder, SimpleTikaBuilder, SmsBuilder, StringResolutionBuilder, TikaBuilderDelegate

    public interface Builder<T>
    General interface for all builders. The builder help to construct an object using a fluent interface. The aim is to abstract object creation and help linking with other objects.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T build()
      Instantiate and configures the instance.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        T build()
        Instantiate and configures the instance.
        Returns:
        The built instance
        Throws:
        BuildException - when the object couldn't be constructed
